channel.title: rebase on Bas-Man's Ponderings
channel.description: Recent content in rebase on Bas-Man's Ponderings

item.description: Taken from Stack Overflow https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7175869/managing-hotfixes-when-develop-branch-is-very-different-from-master Take all commits to master and merge them back in to development git checkout devel git rebase master
